**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- A mesmerizing gemstone caps the head of this handsomely crafted wooden staff. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify enchantment magic. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Enchantment **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
  • **1st** [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45)
  • **2nd** [_hideous laughter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [_touch of idiocy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=341)
Staff of Enchantment (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)
  • **4th** _charm_, [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
Staff of Enchantment (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** _command_, [_crushing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=57)
  • **6th** [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [_feeblemind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=112)
name: Staff of Enchantment (Major)
